name: Casco Development
tag_list: shop-floor-control, shop-floor-data-collection, labor-tracking, machine-monitoring, job-tracking, mes
overview:
Casco Development markets ShopVue, shop floor control software that extends ERP systems to provide labor management, order tracking, and machine monitoring on the factory floor.

Using touchscreen terminals, barcode and RF scanners, or handheld computers, ShopVue collects data from factory operators at the point of work in as few steps as possible. ShopVue then delivers this data to manager workstations and customer ERP and payroll systems in real time.

ShopVue software is organized into 18 modules and add-ons to deliver commonly-requested features like lot and serial tracking, component control, paperless dispatch, and short-term factory scheduling.

Casco was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Portland, Maine.
